name: Cha-Cha-Chain!
description:
- Our submission for the Climax Studios Game Jam 2022. -

Take the theme-keyword 'Chain', add a pinch of mismatched Latin-American influences and supplement a swell 'Cha-Cha type-o-beat'. 

Given this recipe we created this small party-game prototype in the small time-span of 2 days. Try to line up a chain of 50 followers in order to pry open the old man's chest and free the world from his stern demand for peace and quiet!

Developers: [Team Lock-Cookies]

- Aurora
- Jad D
- Jan - hbb
- Kairoz
